title: Which common application college essay should I write? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t know your strengths Michael, only you know that, only you know what is original and authentic about your own personality and motivations. Therefore you are the only one who can decide what your essay topic will be. Perhaps, if I were in your shoes, I would start by roughly drafting several essays, then deciding which topic had more meat, more fully represented your ambitions than the others. Bon Chance
